title: Google\Cloud\Redis\V1beta1\PersistenceConfig
name: PersistenceConfig
description:
Configuration of the persistence functionality.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.redis.v1beta1.PersistenceConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.persistence_mode
params.description: Optional. Controls whether Persistence features are enabled. If not provided, the existing value will be used.

params.name: data.rdb_snapshot_period
params.description: Optional. Period between RDB snapshots. Snapshots will be attempted every period starting from the provided snapshot start time. For example, a start time of 01/01/2033 06:45 and SIX_HOURS snapshot period will do nothing until 01/01/2033, and then trigger snapshots every day at 06:45, 12:45, 18:45, and 00:45 the next day, and so on. If not provided, TWENTY_FOUR_HOURS will be used as default.

params.name: data.rdb_next_snapshot_time
params.description: Output only. The next time that a snapshot attempt is scheduled to occur.

params.name: data.rdb_snapshot_start_time
params.description: Optional. Date and time that the first snapshot was/will be attempted, and to which future snapshots will be aligned. If not provided, the current time will be used.

methods.name: getPersistenceMode
methods.description:
Optional. Controls whether Persistence features are enabled.

If not provided, the existing value will be used.
